projects.title: Todo List
projects.description: A simple ASP.NET Core Todo List project. Allows users to Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) a list. I wanted to explore other common in demand technologies to give my portfolio more variety so I built something simple and deployed it. I plan to further my knowledge in ASP.NET by creating a more advanced website in the future.

projects.title: Tech Blog Shorts
projects.description: Tech Blog Shorts is a social platform where anyone can create an account, post a blog, and recieve comments from other users. This app explores interesting topics like: custom authentication, Model-View-Control (MVC), handlebars.js (similar to React), and an SQL database.
